text:
Hi all, my company uses HubSpot for blogs currently. They want to see how feasible it would be to create a membership portal for events in HS.

Criteria:

• On login there is a homepage/dashboard that can pull up event information specific to the user
• An event progression bar that tracks the status of what forms/details the user has completed
• A bunch of content pages with navigation 
• Each user’s information is private and only accessible via that login
Would this level of platform be possible?
Im going to tag <@U25C65C3S> in on this one, he would probably be a good person to speak to this.

Ideally you should do this with custom objects for the events
progression could be connected to the individual event or a series of contact fields
We’ve built out <http://sprockettalk.com|sprockettalk.com> in a similar way and also a couple of other clients.
<@U01PE6T9GMT> if you’d like to discuss we can jump on a call here sometime next week. <http://meetimpulse.com/remington|meetimpulse.com/remington>
